title: Designing Language Education Simulations Using Visual Instructional Design Tools

context.additional_context: Training on utilizing instructional design representation tools for language practice in VR environments

learning_goals: Learners will use visual design tools to represent the learning flow of language education simulations in three or more stages.
Learners will independently create activity blueprints in VR environments that account for learner experiences.
Learners will revise blueprints incorporating peer feedback and submit final versions aligned with evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
